Convert string to number '42';42;42
Convert string to number '   -42';   -42;-42
Convert string to number '4193 with words';4193 with words;4193
Convert string to number 'words and 987';words and 987;0
Convert string to number '9223372036854775808';9223372036854775808;2147483647
Convert string to number '-9223372036854775808';-9223372036854775808;-2147483648
